description.value: Your eyes are sharp, allowing you to make out small details about concealed or even invisible creatures that others might miss. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus when using the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action to find @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} creatures within 30 feet of you. When you target an opponent that is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from you or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from you, reduce the DC of the flat check to 3 for a @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} target or 9 for a @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} one.
